item.description:
All paddlers, regardless of experience are welcome, including first time paddlers! It's a lot of fun, not to mention a great workout. Bring clothes you don't mind getting wet, non cotton synthetic material recommended. Paddles and life jackets are provided. Practice is 2 hours long. Dress for the weather and feel free to bring a water bottle.

Worried you'll be the only one there, based on the meetup rsvp? We actually have between 20-40 people at each practice, so just because the meetup says 1-2 people are attending doesn't mean that's actually the case!

Email one of the meetup organizers or RSVP to the event to get started!
item.name: Thursday Practice (Introductory Session)
